mapper.insert: insert into share_files values(default, #{name}, #{description}, #{originAddress}, #{visualSource}, #{visualType}, #{structuredSource}, #{tags, typeHandler = njnu.edu.back.common.utils.ArrayTypeHandler}, #{creator}, now(), #{meta}, #{download}, #{watch}, now(), #{avatar}, #{originName}, #{structuredName}, #{visualName});
mapper.select: select share_files.*, users.name as "userName", users.avatar as "userAvatar" from users, share_files where users.email = share_files.creator order by ${property} desc limit #{size} offset #{start};
select share_files.*, users.name, users.avatar from users, share_files where users.email = share_files.creator order by ${property} asc limit #{size} offset #{start};
select * from share_files where name like #{keyWord} order by ${property} desc limit #{size} offset #{start};
select * from share_files where name like #{keyWord} order by ${property} asc limit #{size} offset #{start};
select count(*) from share_files where name like #{keyWord};
mapper.update: update share_files set watch = watch + 1 where id::text = #{id};
update share_files set download = download + 1 where id::text = #{id};
mapper.select: select origin_name, origin_address, get_online from share_files, file_meta where share_files.id::text = #{id} and file_meta.id::text = share_files.meta;
mapper.update:
update share_files set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, origin_name = #{originName}, structured_name = #{structuredName}, visual_source = #{visualSource}, visual_name = #{visualName}, origin_address = #{originAddress}, visual_type = #{visualType}, structured_source = #{structuredSource}, tags = #{tags, typeHandler = njnu.edu.back.common.utils.ArrayTypeHandler}, avatar = #{avatar} where id::text = #{id};
update file_meta set provider = #{provider}, time = #{time}, range = #{range}, detail = #{detail}, type = #{type}, provider_phone = #{providerPhone}, provider_email = #{providerEmail}, provider_address = #{providerAddress}, get_online = #{getOnline} where id::text = (select meta from share_files where id::text = #{id});
